subtitle.Text: Karla: Yeah, I ended up being pretty happy with this, this is the only picture of Lonnie that we had for a really long time, and I was really glad to actually come up with something that we liked,
since this kind of thing is really hard, especially when it is such a major character. The other thing is Lonnie has a cross necklace. She also has some Catholicism in her family.
Steve: Yeah, and I think that’s something that, I don’t think that particular detail has been called out by anybody, people notice the bibles and whatnot, but yeah, I intended for Lonnie -
I thought it would be interesting if she came from a more conservative family than Sam’s in that she actually wears a cross necklace and carries some Catholicism with her
and her dad was an Army guy, and her background is, even in some ways, maybe kind of more stifling than Sam’s, and that’s probably why she’s a more openly rebellious person on the outside.
